The compiled version for this machine is located in
/opt/virtuoso-6.1.4/default
.
To create a new instance copy this directory to something like /opt/virtuoso-6.1.4/myinstance and make the appropriate changes (port, paths, etc.) in /opt/virtuoso-6.1.4/myinstance/bin/virtuoso.ini
